Introduction
This topic contains information on notifying the Philadelphia Insurance Center of changes in a beneficiary’s competency status and/or fiduciary, including
hub responsibility to forward
VA Form 21P-555
to the Philadelphia Insurance Center
, and
handling requests initiated by the Philadelphia Insurance Center
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section C - General Information on Incompetency and Fiduciary Cases
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section C
